channel.title: Browsers on Sajal Kayan
channel.description: Recent content in Browsers on Sajal Kayan

item.title: Has Chrome killed Firefox?
item.description: ... well not yet... Just a while ago, Google launched their own browser Chrome. It does look good, has many cool features, more secure, more stable, but still a beta. And this time its really a beta. Currently its available only for windows, however the main point is that its opensource and a Linux and Mac builds are expected soon. My 5 minute experience with Chrome. Screen 1 > Every thing looks good... Screen 2 > Overflow!! And No! I dont use windows! Just fired up VMware with Windoze XP to test Chrome PS : If anyone got Chrome working with wine on Linux do gimme a buzz. Would like to know.
